description: From French automatiser, from automate (“automaton”). Equivalent to automate +‎ -ize.

verbs.description: automatize (third-person singular simple present automatizes, present participle automatizing, simple past and past participle automatized)

examples: Student responses are gradually automatized through repetition.

entries.meaning: To cause to be automated; to automate.
examples: We need to automatize our production facility.
